[[File:Måns Björkman - Elendil device.pn: The [[Livery of Elendil]] were a number of symbols used by the [[Realms in Exile]] and their decendant kingdoms, [[Gondor]] and [[Arnor]]. It consisted of the [[Seven Stars]], the [[Crown of Gondor]] and the [[Nimloth (tree)
thumb]]: White Tree]]. Upon Arnor's fall and the failing of the line of the [[Kings of Gondor
column3: Kings of Gondor]] the crown was largely dropped from usage and not until the coming of [[Aragorn]], and the raising of his banner at the [[Battle of the Pelennor Fields
column4: Battle of Pelennor Fields]], was the crown used again.<ref>{{RK
